channel.title: Nvidia on tyler houchin
channel.description: Recent content in Nvidia on tyler houchin

item.title: The Day AI Got the Cheapest Again
item.description:
Yesterday’s market reaction to DeepSeek’s R1 model breakthrough was dramatic, to say the least. The Nasdaq dropped 3.1%, and Nvidia saw its stock plummet by 17% - the largest single-day market cap loss in Wall Street history. The narrative? A Chinese hedge fund’s ability to train and run powerful AI models at a fraction of the cost threatens the entire AI ecosystem.

DeepSeek R1’s performance benchmarks compared to other leading models
